comment: Professor White was not very helpful if you needed extra help.  I quote from experience and other classmates, his response to emails "It's in the syllabus" .  Takes forever to grade, doesn't respond to emails in a timely manner.  Didn't use his own material for the course.  Borrow from another professor.  Avoid Professor White if possible.

At first I thoroughly enjoyed the class. Mr. White would use video podcasts for visual aid, but that was all gone during the second half of the semester. I felt like he was rude and unfriendly with the students when replying in the discussions. He didn't seem concerned that most of his students were struggling. I personally wouldn't recommend.
